casebody.data:
WILSON
v.
WILSON 328P16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 6, 2016 Linwood E. Wilson, for Wilson, Linwood. Autumn D. Osbourne, Attorney at Law, Gray Ellis, Attorney at Law, Durham, for Wilson, Barbara.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 6th of September 2016 by Plaintiff for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 6th of September 2016."
